title: Chris Matheson – 2020 Comments on Amal Clooney Resignation
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Matheson, the Shadow Media Minister, on 18 September 2020.
content:
It is humiliating that the UK’s special envoy on media freedom has felt unable to continue in her role.
